name: Guts 'N Goals: Preseason
description:
This isn't your standard game of soccer. This is Guts 'N Goals, where you use a bat instead of your feet to score goals.

Choose from over 20 unique heroes and get ready to play the world’s game like never before!

Different ways to play - Each stadium has a unique way to play a game of soccer. Score a goal with a beach ball, hit a hockey puck at arcade room or cross the river that divided the swamp.

Keeping you on your toes - A random mutator will appear in every match and will change the way you play. A ball that explodes, hovers, maybe it will grow spikes... What if all players exchange their abilities?

There are no penalty cards - Each of the over 20 heroes has a unique ability that can drastically change the tide of a match. Use your teammates as a weapon, throw an army of cats with bats, attract your enemies with the power of your tuba or transform your foes into chickens. Possibilities are endless.

Play your way - Guts 'N Goals can be played both online and offline, singleplayer, co-op, multiplayer. Enjoy this hilarious take on Soccer however you like!
